description: This lusciously green chicken salad with an easy-to-make pickled cucumber heroes fresh spring produce and is ready in 30 minutes. Learn how to make this easy salad recipe that's perfect for lunch or dinner.
keywords: Spring Greens And Sesame-Crusted Chicken Salad
name: Spring Greens And Sesame-Crusted Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup tamari soy sauce wheat free

recipeInstructions.text: Drain cucumber mixture, discarding liquid. Divide spinach, avocado, radish, edamame, peas, pickled cucumber, chicken, onion and coriander among bowls. Serve with soy dressing.
